channel.title: Ascaria - Looking for interested client developers!
channel.description:
[center]Do [b]YOU[/b] have what it takes to be a [i]client developer[/i]? Well, this could be your chance!
Ascaria, a 2006 custom economy server, is currently looking for interested members to join the client development team.
[SPOILER=Requirements] There are some requirements for joining the client development team:
[ul][li]Fluent in the English language;[/li] [li]Past experience with client developing (recommended);[/li] [li]Large understanding of how the client works;[/li] [li]Large understanding of java;[/li] [li]Respect and dedication;[/li] [li]Hard-Working[/li][/ul]
[/SPOILER] If you meet these requirements and interested, please contact me (owner of Ascaria) via Skype. My Skype username is [b]jon.niemiec[/b] and I am usually always online!
Unfortunately, we don't have much to show for our recent client development updates, as our former client developer wasn't active enough to push updates. Luckily, we do have lots to offer on the server side of things! :)
[SPOILER=Current Staff] [u]Current Staff:[/u] Owner: Mod Jon Lead Content Developer: Mod Austin Content Developer: Mod Four Web Developer: Mod Osiris[/center]

item.title: Ascaria - Looking for interested client developers!
item.dc:creator: @Ascaria Ascaria
item.description:
@Ascaria wrote:

[center]Do YOU have what it takes to be a client developer?
Well, this could be your chance!

Ascaria, a 2006 custom economy server, is currently looking for interested members to join the client development team.

[SPOILER=Requirements]
There are some requirements for joining the client development team:

[ul][li]Fluent in the English language;[/li]
[li]Past experience with client developing (recommended);[/li]
[li]Large understanding of how the client works;[/li]
[li]Large understanding of java;[/li]
[li]Respect and dedication;[/li]
[li]Hard-Working[/li][/ul]

[/SPOILER]
If you meet these requirements and interested, please contact me (owner of Ascaria) via Skype. My Skype username is jon.niemiec and I am usually always online!

Unfortunately, we don’t have much to show for our recent client development updates, as our former client developer wasn’t active enough to push updates. Luckily, we do have lots to offer on the server side of things!

[SPOILER=Current Staff]
Current Staff:
Owner: Mod Jon
Lead Content Developer: Mod Austin
Content Developer: Mod Four
Web Developer: Mod Osiris[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Ascaria - Looking for interested client developers!
